statements: UPDATE customer_behavior SET customer_name = 'John Doe', purchase_history = 'New purchase history' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET preferences = '{"color": "blue", "theme": "light"}', customer_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET preferences = '{"mode": "online"}', purchase_history = '[{"item": "Shirt", "quantity": 2}]' WHERE customer_id = 123
UPDATE customer_behavior SET customer_name = 'John Doe', purchase_history = '[]' WHERE customer_id = 456
UPDATE customers SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE shopper_segments SET segment_description = 'High spending customers' WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
UPDATE customers SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE shopper_segments SET total_shoppers = total_shoppers + 1000, segment_description = 'Updated description' WHERE segment_name = 'Regular Shoppers';
UPDATE shoppers SET shopper_name = 'Alice', registration_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE shopper_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET total_amount = 150.75, items_purchased = 5 WHERE shopper_id = 2;
UPDATE shoppers SET registration_date = '2021-05-20' WHERE shopper_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET total_amount = 150.75, items_purchased = 5 WHERE shopper_id = 1;

UPDATE customers SET name='John Doe', age=30 WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=15.99, brand='New Brand' WHERE product_id=3;
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1, brand = 'New Brand' WHERE category = 'Electronics';
